attributes.action: Rescind the latest invitation to Donald Trump for a State visit in June 2019.
attributes.additional_details: He has also attempted to obstruct justice and colluded with Russia.  Evidence - see Mueller Report.
attributes.background: The invitation to Donald Trump for a state visit to the UK should be rescinded.  He has shown contempt for the rule of law and the democratic values; e.g. tolerance, individual rights and freedom of the press that have been the bedrock of Western alliances since WW2, while ignoring political murder.
